name: Arena
description: A grand arena provides entertainment through combat and competition, offering opportunities for glory and profit, but the violent nature creates both excitement and danger. The competitive environment creates opportunities for advancement and fame, while the focus on violence can attract both spectators and dangerous competitors.
atmosphere: Sand-covered floor bears dark stains from countless battles. Stone walls rise in towering tiers lined with wooden benches. The metallic scent of blood mingles with sweat and leather. Discarded weapons and torn banners litter the arena's edge.
